objectName.description: Name of the object in the 'PathObj.bin' file.

path.description: Name of the spline in a PATH file for the object to follow.

speed.description: The speed the object moves at.

interpolation.description: Interpolated angle curves when taking sharp turns on splines.

Extra.name: Initialises an object on a spline - requires the object to be referenced in the 'PathObj.bin' file.
